Class Room

  • java.lang.Object
    • Room

  • public class Room
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Room - a location in an adventure game. This class is part of the "World of Zuul: A lesser Evil" game A "Room" represents one location in the scenery of the game. It is connected to other rooms via exits. For each existing exit, the room stores a reference to the neighboring room. The room also has an inventory of items. It can also store a GamePlay object. It can also have locked rooms for which the player requires a "key" in order to traverse
    Version:
    2017.12.08
    Author:
    Michael KÃ¶lling and David J. Barnes and Anton Luca-Dorin

      • getExit

        public Room getExit(java.lang.String direction)
        Return the room that is reached if we go from this room in direction "direction". If there is no room in that direction, return null.
        Parameters:
        direction - The exit's direction.
        Returns:
        The room in the given direction.

      • setGamePlay

        public void setGamePlay(GamePlay gamePlay)
        Define gamePlay for this room. this is not done in the constructor, as the information required is not available at the time of construction
        Parameters:
        gamePlay - the gamePlay for this room
